case.state: I suppose a friendly game wouldn't hurt. What did you call it again?
Ping, did you say…? You look very similar to a friend…
I'm sorry, but did you say Strip Poker? That can't be right.
Poker? I've seen guards playing that! What are the stakes? I think I have some money somewhere.
Poker sounds like fun! Is it hard to learn?
...Could I have ~cards~ cards, please?
I wish I had ~cards~ more cards!
Can I take 6 cards? No? Fine, then: give me ~cards~.
Ha ha! Beginner's luck!
I think I'm getting the hang of this!
I'm a fast learner!
I'm a natural at this!
Ha! I'm looking forward to this round.
Oh, these cards are wonderful!
This is easy! As expected of a princess!
You're going to beat me? I don't think so!
If I'd only had cards like these a few hands ago, I wouldn't be standing here like this.
Finally!
I can't believe I'm playing strip poker with a princess! What a n--I mean, dream come true!
Does the order of the cards matter, or just the numbers on them?
I wonder - would a princess outrank a jack?
I'm still not sure I get this, but I'll do my best.
Princess Elena! What a surprise to see you here!
You're still coming to our party, right Elena?
I know what I'm doing! I've seen the guards playing cards before...
I can do this! I think.
Does the order of the cards matter, or just the numbers on them?
I wonder - would a princess outrank a jack?
I'm still not sure I get this, but I'll do my best.
I can still win with this hand!
Okay, let me deal with this calmly...
I can still pull this off!
If I had one wish, I'd wish for my clothing back. Or at least my top!
Can someone please explain how to play again?
Is an ace high or low?
I may not know much about this game, but I know enough to realize when I have a lousy hand.
I'd like to believe I'll win with these cards, but I'm fresh out of optimism.
I may be in over my head...
Dawn can't come soon enough.
I may have finally bitten off more than I can chew...
My father wouldn't like the way you're treating me. You remember my father... the Sultan?
This isn't fair! This must be some kind of magic!
Maybe it's not so bad if I lose...
How did it come to this?
I should have known this was a bad idea when Iago suggested it.
No, no, no! I can't lose again!
(Goodness, it really is you! Let's… enjoy ourselves, away from Aladdin and Shang tonight. They're open-minded, anyway.)
No thank you, Mulan. I think we know each other well enough.
Come now, Mulan, you know exactly my type. Debonair street rats with a flair for the magical.
Why don't we play for money instead? Come on, who doesn't like gold?
Just when I thought I was getting the hang of it...
I understand what needs to be done. Did you think I was stupid?
A princess knows how to lose gracefully.
I should have watched the guards playing cards more carefully...
There's no sense crying over spilt milk or bared flesh.
Somehow this is easier when everyone else is already naked. I feel like part of a harem!
Sigh! A princess knows the needs of her people outweigh that of her own.
Beginner's luck only goes so far, huh? What are my options?
Very well... a princess always keeps her word. Um, and so do ordinary girls like me!
It seems there is more to this game than I had realized.
So many choices... let me think!
My husband wouldn't like this! But then again, he's the one who said I needed to let loose once in a while.
Strange, I don't remember you asking me on a date. And yet somehow I'm still taking my clothes off for you.
Somehow this is easier when everyone else is already naked. I feel like part of a harem!
Oh, if my father could see me now - no longer his precious flower!
I lost! So... now what? Am I out of the game?
Me again? This might be a short game.
I can't believe people play this game for fun.
Well, I did say I'd spend the day like a street rat if it killed me. And it just might at this rate.
You won't tell my father, will you?
Uh, just out of curiosity... are we sure we're alone?
You won't get away with this, you monster!
Stop that! You're leering at me worse than Jafar!
Even with women from beyond Earth, I'm still a princess, and a powerful one at that!
Are you serious? Please don't turn this into a musical. Ping.
Are you serious? ...You are? Well. I did agree to the game. I, uh, I'll just remove my scarf then. Is that fair?
You've forced my hand! BEHOLD: I am no mere street rat! I am... Princess Jasmine!
Your word is my command! I'll remove my earrings.
I'll give up my necklace. That counts, right?
Good-bye, slippers! You've served me well.
I'm down to the last thing I can afford to lose!
In the palace there's always people who tell you where to go and how to dress. You're not free to make your own choices. This is so much better.
A princess never strips naked in front of strangers!
Oh, don't fret over us. I just think Ping and I needed to come to an understanding.
♩ No need to be a sore loser, or you can go buh-bye ♩ Oh. Um. I'm just a regular girl who likes to sing.
W-what are you talking about, Zoey? I'm just a plain, ordinary peasant girl, not the incredibly beautiful and famous princess!
Thank you, Jin. I certainly thought so.
Maybe if I were to dress up like a man, someone might have bought it. Cough, doubtful, cough.
It was a pretty good disguise, I thought. Better than Mulan's, anyway.
Why, yes! I'm Princess Jasmine of Agrabah, Aella! Though, it's a relief to know I'm not going to cause a scandal...
Ah, no. I mostly experience magic, rather than use it.
That's slander, Zone-tan! I would never do what you do with your octopus with Rajah!
It is nice to appear in public without my guards. It lets me discover what my people are doing!
What? No, I don't think we've met before. I'm just a plain old regular girl.
...Aren't you surprised? I thought this disguise was pretty good.
I get them back at the end, don't I? They were a gift from my father!
Be careful with it - it's a family heirloom!
I got myself into this mess. I'll deal with the consequences.
I am still a princess even without my diadem!
Did you think I would back down? That I would cry? You don't know me very well, do you?
I've never done a thing on my own. I've never had any real friends, never been allowed to let loose. Until now.
It's really true! I'm free to do anything I like!
Maybe I don't wanna be a princess anymore.
Okay, so, um... did I win or lose?
Ah-ha!
Sorry, ~name~, but you've got to do better than that if you want to win!
What's good for the goose is good for the gander!
I like how this is going so far.
It's showtime!
I always get my man.
There's no harm in losing, is there ~name~?
Perfect timing!
Sorry, ~name~, but you've got to do better than that if you want to win!
What's good for the goose is good for the gander! Or the Xander, in this case.
I like how this is going so far.
Okay, so, um... did I win or lose?
Ah-ha!
Sorry, ~name~, but you've got to do better than that if you want to win!
What's good for the goose is good for the gander!
I like how this is going so far.
It's showtime!
I always get my man.
There's no harm in losing, is there ~name~?
Perfect timing!
So ~name~ lost? What does she do now?
Wait, don't tell me - I lost, didn't I?
If I've got this right, then ~name~ lost.
Just take a deep breath, ~name~.
I can see how some people could find this fun!
This is getting exciting!
I could order the servants to strip... but it wouldn't be as exciting!
Even princesses can have a little fun!
You know what would make this even better? Some music!
Remove your clothes, by order of the princess!
At least I won't be alone!
Don't fret, ~name~. If I can do it, you can too!
I think Ping looks quite effeminate.
Oh, here comes the reveal? And so early in the game!
You held out for a while, Mulan!
So ~name~ lost? What does she do now?
Wait, don't tell me - I lost, didn't I?
If I've got this right, then ~name~ lost.
Just take a deep breath, ~name~.
I can see how some people could find this fun!
This is getting exciting!
I could order the servants to strip... but it wouldn't be as exciting!
Even princesses can have a little fun!
You know what would make this even better? Some music!
Remove your clothes, by order of the princess!
At least I won't be alone!
Don't fret, ~name~. If I can do it, you can too!
Things like that count as clothes, too? Huh.
So now you take something off, right?
Well, that's... disappointing.
I'm not mad. It would be petty to be mad over a game. A stupid game.
Do I have to call the guards?
You're using magic somehow! I just know it!
When I tell this story, I'll leave out this part.
You two-faced son of a jackal!
There must be something I'm missing about all this.
So... this is fun, is it? Hmm.
I saw that coming. I must be getting a knack for this!
That doesn't even seem like a penalty, but what do I know?
I wonder if this is why my suitors always wore so much jewelry?
I've never fed anyone to my pet tiger... There's a first time for everything, though.
Do you know what the punishment for cheating is in Agrabah?
I've never been so embarrassed in all my life!
Just... go jump off a balcony!
I wish you'd say I'm only dreaming...
Does... does that make you royalty?
How wonderful to be playing in such esteemed company...
I've seen men like him down at the souk…
Nice to meet you, Lady Rivendell. I am Princess Jasmine of Agrabah.
A brilliant idea! I wish I'd thought of it first.
Such a powerful amulet!
Wait. P-Princess ~name~?! What are you doing here?
I wish I'd known you'd be here, Princess ~name~!
Oh, that counts? I may be better prepared than I thought!
This could be an expensive game if we don't get those back...
I was getting all worked up about nothing - this game seems like harmless fun.
I suppose this makes us even?
I've never seen such a thing in the markets of Agrabah! Wherever did you buy it?
Does this mean I'm losing?
I suppose this is all part of the game, too?
Why didn't I wear more jewelry tonight? It's not like I don't own enough!
I don't think that will distract anyone from me, do you?
Hmph!
Undressing you is like giving a tiger a bath. And I speak from experience!
Ah, a poet! I like you, Arwen.
How dare you call me that!
...This is just a friendly game, isn't it?
...Charming? Oh. But he is ever-so-wonderful, of course.
Are you able to harness your amulet's magic?
Don't worry, Chara. I'm about to die of embarrassment anyway.
I-I mean, there's nothing wrong with that. Your highness.
Because, um, I would have worn more appropriate clothing to greet a princess! Right! That's what I meant.
How could you? I thought we were friends!
Tell me, Princess - when did you last let your heart decide?
There must be something I'm missing about all this.
So... this is fun, is it? Hmm.
I saw that coming. I'm catching on!
Oh, you wouldn't know fashion if it came up and bit you on the leg.
That doesn't even seem like a penalty, but what do I know?
I can't wait to see more!
How could you?
Some people just don't fight fair.
Just wait, ~name~! You'll get exactly what's coming to you!
Tell me, ~name~ - when did you last let your heart decide?
You're just like Rapunzel, except instead of letting your hair down you've let everyone down.
I can feel every eye on me!
You do seem overdressed, Freddie.
Suddenly I see why everyone is so heavily dressed...
Well, that's... something.
You've never heard of noblesse oblige, have you?
You clearly have no respect for royalty.
You do seem overdressed, ~name~.
You have a lot to learn about being a gentleman, ~name~!
If you don't mind, could you lose faster?
Is that all? I don't want to waste a single second of my time here.
It makes me wonder if you have something to hide.
So... this is the point of the game? Hmm.
We're going to be here for a while, aren't we?
What are you, a mouse or a man?
It's not right to toy with people like that!
When I rule Agrabah, the first thing I will decree is to change this stupid rule.
You're in league with Jafar. Admit it!
It's not right to toy with people's affections like this!
How terrible!
I have a pair like that! They were a gift from one of my suitors.
Are you out of jewelry already? I didn't think that was possible for a princess.
Oh, ~name~ - live a little! It's fun to let loose once in a while!
Surely you must have something smaller to start with?
I see! Wait, no I don't.
Oh... are you out of jewelry already?
I hope this isn't too embarrassing for you!
You wouldn't be wearing so much if you lived in the desert!
What a shame! You look lovely with your ~clothing~ on.
Don't worry! You'll still look perfectly respectable.
Clearly I have a lot to learn about this game.
How... shrewd of you.
Make yourself more comfortable, ~name~.
Do you think anyone will notice something that little when I'm here doing this?
Let's just hurry this up before someone sees me like this!
That must have been painful...
Thank you, Lux! You seem very friendly too.
No!
I knew it! You are in league with Jafar!
My! You appear to be well brought-up, ~name~. Unlike some people I could mention.
So... this is fun, is it? Hmm.
Maybe we're not at the exciting part yet.
Being honest, this is rather boring.
I'm surprised you were wearing so much to begin with!
There we go! That wasn't so hard, was it?
You're running out of layers, aren't you?
Is that all? I've seen more flesh on display walking through the market.
I was told this would be an unforgettable game. I didn't realize it was because I'd be humiliated!
That's incredible - you're taking off so little, yet you've got me spellbound.
I wonder if Genie can make me forget this...
Nobody would even think of beating me this badly at the palace. I love it!
I swear, if Scheherazade puts this in her tell-all book, I'll skin her alive!
Now I see why Jafar thought it would be funny for me to play.
Everyone's staring at me...
Too little, too late. Stupid cards.
You tease! You've already got me turned on.
It must be beginner's luck!
I'm better at this game than I realized.
Don't be so stuffy, ~name~. We're all friends here!
Ah, now we're getting somewhere!
Do as I command, ~name~: remove your ~clothing~!
I certainly don't mind seeing more of you...
Your ~clothing~? Oh, that'll be fine.
Well, it's about time!
For some reason, I thought it would be harder to reach this stage.
I suppose this is a little fun!
I must say, you look very dashing!
I never saw anything like this from the palace window!
Oh, I wish I was better at cards...
You may have beaten me, but at least you weren't the first man to see me naked.
I mean, oh, I'm incredibly surprised that it's Mulan!
I'll admit your disguise has a charm to it.
Boy, do I know how you feel right now.
I think we've both learned a valuable lesson today...
Come on, ~name~ - where's your sense of adventure?
What are clothes for if not to remove them?
What a fusspot! You're wearing more than I am!
What are you doing, ~name~?
I'm really very sorry, ~name~.
Not enough layers? I could lend you some of my jewelry.
Your ~clothing~? Fair enough.
Your ~clothing~ is just outrageous!
Is that the legendary dance of the seven veils?
Honestly! If Aladdin wanted to see this, all he had to do was ask me!
There's something to the way you slip out of your ~clothing~ that catches the eye. I'll have to study you more closely.
You call that a strip tease? Dance!
Let's just hurry this up before someone sees me like this!
Now that's more like it!
It is very nice.
How do you avoid ruffling your clothes under all that heavy armor?
You're so... muscular! Are you an athlete of some kind?
Things are really different outside the palace, aren't they?
Surely we've all seen enough by now. Why don't we call it a day?
Call me sheltered, but I just don't see the appeal of this.
You're not leaving a lot to the imagination!
Things are really different outside the palace, aren't they?
Thank goodness Aladdin isn't here to see this!
You could dance for a living, ~name~!
Don't be nervous, ~name~. You're doing fine.
Tell me, how do you keep your figure so firm?
Is that silk? It's lovely.
This is a lot more fun than that silly slumber party Aurora had!
Beautiful! Just beautiful.
You have such exotic skin, ~name~!
Maybe I will let Aladdin play this game...
Mm, but it's working - I want to see more!
I'm not sure I see the point of this game...
I can't wait to see what happens next!
Are you trying to win my heart, ~name~? I'm spoken for.
So brazen! You remind me of Aladdin, when we first met.
This seems like something only your lover should be seeing.
Just like home...
I must have a talent for poker!
You remind me of someone I met in the marketplace...
You could give my suitors a run for their money!
Oh, a working man's build... so different from a soft aristocrat.
You look as strong as ten regular men!
Now that's a sight for sore eyes...
I've changed my mind. I love this game!
Hmm! I never realized how incredibly handsome you are...
~name~, you have my royal favor.
You're so thoughtful, Link... how on Earth did you get roped into playing this?
Perhaps I can see the point of the game...
If you're trying to impress me, I'd prefer a game of wits.
It's good to get away from the guards and their rules for a change.
No matter what the species, men are men.
Tell me the truth, ~name~: you wanted to lose, didn't you?
Show me a whole new world, ~name~!
I really must play this game with Aladdin!
~name~ is out of the game now, right?
I see why father didn't want me socializing with strangers!
Oh... so they do come in different sizes after all!
Maybe you just don't have what it takes to be a hero...
Once again I realize how lucky I am to have found my Aladdin!
Your little soldier is standing at attention, I see.
Now I'm even more frustrated!
~name~ is out of the game now, right?
I see why father didn't want me socializing with strangers!
Oh! I didn't know they could twitch like that.
If you've seen one, you've seen them all.
It’s so big. Have you been harboring lustful thoughts for your princess all this time, you naughty man?
What a man!
This reminds me of my wedding night. It was so magical!
~name~ is out of the game now, right?
I see why father didn't want me socializing with strangers!
They should let princesses have harems, too! It's so unfair.
They grow them big on the streets, don't they?
THAT is supposed to fit in there? This is a joke, right?
You must join me for dinner at the palace tonight, my humongous prince.
I can tell what you wished for!
My, you are a worthy man.
I feel like I've wandered into the harem by mistake!
This is no children's game! What have I gotten myself into?
I had no idea that women could be so bold.
I am not a prize to be won... but I'm beginning to think that you might be, ~name~.
I had no idea that women could be so bold. I approve.
I'm as ready as I'll ever be. Go ahead and show us, ~name~.
Let there be no secrets between us, ~name~.
At least you'll be in good company...
It seems I have some competition for the spotlight!
How humiliating for you!
Don't worry, my dear - I'm sure they'll grow.
You have hidden charms, ~name~!
A small bosom is an old woman's friend, for she will stay young in the heart of her lover.
Ooh, I like you.
You have nothing to be ashamed of!
It may be time to arrange a royal sleepover...
Oh, those yearn to be stroked...
Many a love poem has been inspired by such nubile breasts! And many a nervous grope in the closet.
Do you two have a relationship?
What else would they be?
There's no justice if a girl like you is as stunning as that!
Those definitely make up for your personality.
You'll make a fine wife someday, ~name~.
A maiden in her prime!
My dear, any man would be proud to call you his.
So... it's a punishment game?
You must have a lot of suitors!
This game is completely ridiculous, but... let's keep playing anyway.
I've always wondered if women from other lands looked the same.
You're gorgeous! I'm a little jealous.
Such firm, round breasts! You're blessed.
Magnificent. You should show those off more often!
You'd make a good present for my husband.
You're beautiful, ~name~.
You're a princess and you've got those? Ooh, this isn't fair!
Those are less like pomegranates and more like melons!
I don't know whether to be impressed or feel sorry for you.
You're so well endowed! Well. Too bad you're not royalty.
You'll make a wonderful mother, ~name~!
Such a buxom chest! I admit defeat. And to a little envy.
I hear the guards talk about breasts like those... and what they'd like to do with them.
This is a bit humbling.
Oh! Do you have a magic carpet, too?
I had no idea this kind of game was happening in my k-- um, my neighbourhood.
You think I don't know anything, huh? I know plenty about the real world! I'm not shocked by this at all!
Be brave, ~name~!
Just like the baths at home!
This is just like playing harem slaves!
Silly girl, caught by the same trap as me. I thought you'd have more sense.
I never thought I'd see this...
Ready or not, it's time to bare it all, ~name~.
Hm. Maybe I should've taken you up on your bet, Mulan.
Oh! You meant your-- is that what Aladdin meant?!?
I had no idea you could do that with your, um, with your hair.
Why do you shave? Is it to avoid getting sand down there?
I think it's safe to say I've never had a friend like you!
I'd be shaking if I was stripped naked like that! ...I admire your confidence.
Foreigners really are different!
...Is this what I have to compete with?
It's an indescribable sight...
I can see everything!
Bravo, ~name~! How brave!
It's like a flower... so pretty!
I wonder if mine is like that? I've never seen it up close...
I wonder if I can talk the other princesses into playing this?
Are you sure this is in the rules?
...I have led a sheltered life.

state.text: So you're out of the game. We both know what happens now.

case.state: You were a worthy opponent, ~name~.
It's past time to end this game.
My wish has come true!
This game is great!
Even if it is in the rules, don't you think doing that while I'm standing here like this is just a little strange?
What you are doing is not romance, sir!
So it's true: men are pigs.
Am I supposed to watch? Do you want me to?
You, sir, are no prince... but luckily for you, I've always been attracted to street rats.
Come, show me how you pay proper respect to your princess...
Please, ~name~... don't spare any effort to preserve my modesty. I'm a married woman!
You-- you have no right to look at me that way!
That's barbaric!
If you're looking for encouragement from me, you can have it over my dead body.
You're rubbing that like you expect a genie to come out!
Don't worry, ~name~. I have this effect on many men!
It is good to know I can inspire a man to action!
It's important to be honest about your feelings, Xander.
Save that kind of thing for your wife.
Ugh! Men.
Well, at least it's not the first time I've seen a man do that.
You came so far - like a shooting star!
You look just like my husband on our wedding night.
Good night, my prince.
Done so soon? I know some herbs that would bring you back to life.
It's all so magical!
I can highly recommend this, your highness...
Don't worry, ~name~. A princess can do anything she wants.
Stop that, all of you! How dare you force this poor, defenceless young girl to--
So this is why Aladdin wanted to play!
So this is what my people do for fun?
This is a rare sight outside a harem... I'll be watching closely!
I've always wondered how other girls do it...
Oh, do join in! I could use someone to take charge.
Let me share my whole new world with you!
A poet and a... performer? I've never seen such a thing!
I feel so relieved! If Princess ~name~ is doing it, it can't be inappropriate, can it?
This-- this is actually part of the game?
Surely the Sultan can't know this is going on under his nose... can he?
Am I... am I supposed to watch?
I can't believe you! I could never do that - not for all the silk in Agrabah!
I won't watch... if you don't want me to.
I'll just copy what you do, ~name~.
Don't you dare close your eyes! I won't.
Hmm. I guess I'm more normal than I thought!
The scandal this would cause if anyone saw this...
I should arrange for a royal sleepover sometime! Clothing optional.
How humiliating! You poor girl!
I've never seen this before! My handmaid and I are close, but not that close.
That... that does look like you're enjoying it, ~name~.
Hmm. I guess I'm more normal than I thought!
Your hand glides so smoothly - you have practice with this, don't you?
Perhaps I should be taking notes...
If I had one wish... I'd wish for you to join me.
Your fingers look so skilled! I wonder how they'd feel...
...Am I supposed to applaud now?
Well, this is going to make the next royal visit awkward.
Well, this is going to make the next royal visit a lot more fun!
How inspiring!
At least you're in good company, your highness!
Don't worry, ~name~. I won't breathe a word of this to your family!
That was... indescribable.
I do think royalty should learn more about commoners. I should, um, study this some more.
I... almost hope I lose.
I'm starting to warm up to the idea of Aladdin having a harem...
I've learned so much from you!
So now we are sisters, of a kind.
Y-You want me to do what?!
I hate this! If I do it, I want to do it for love!
You should be honored that your princess is so gracious...
I never had a sister to show me how to do this. I had to teach myself. I hope I'm... good enough.
This isn't so bad. I'm used to being watched.
For someone of my rank to be doing this for your entertainment... it's degrading!
So many nights I used to do this while waiting for my prince...
Fingers are a poor substitute for my Aladdin!
This can't feel this good. Not in public. Not like this!
This is a whole new world!
I can't believe you're making me do this. Me! The princess of Agrabah!
I... oh! Oh! OH!
So... what's your second wish?
I can't go back to where I used to be after this. I'm not sure I want to.
I wanted to experience the world Aladdin came from... I guess I got my wish.
It's like I always say: be a princess in the palace and a slave in the harem!
This certainly qualifies as an unbelievable sight.
So I won? What a waste of time.
Don't treat me with kid gloves just because I'm a princess! I'm not some delicate flower, you know.
Let us never speak of this again. Ever.
I've always believed members of the royal family should consort with the common people! Just... not like this.
I just had the most wonderful time!
This is it! The freedom I've yearned for!
We shall have to make this game a royal tradition!
It's true what they say... Arabian nights are hotter than hot in so many ways.
Why does this feel familiar? And who is 'Akabur'?
You wished for this to happen, didn't you? There's no other explanation!
A princess is always in control... but it felt so good to lose control... I think I have a new fetish.

scene.directive: Do you have any idea the position you put me in with that game of yours?
...Other than the obvious one, I mean. Get your mind out of the gutter!
A princess cannot let her public image be degraded like that!
I won't forget the things you made me do in public.
Also, it was the most fun I've had in years.
Losing control isn't something a princess feels very often. But it felt good.
It left me wanting to explore that side of myself.
I was trying to convince one of my friends to join your next game.
But she said she couldn't do it - couldn't humiliate herself.
The poor thing! She's so tightly wound. Yes, even more than me.
But she was still intrigued by the idea...
What do you say, ~name~? Can you help me teach Elsa to 'let it go'?
